tool_description: Provide a complete address, return the three nearest coastlines by province.  Provide an address string and indicate if you want the lines returned as geo-json.
name: Distance to Coast by Address
title: Distance to Coast by Address

api_list.name: Distance to Coast by Address
api_list.description: Provides three nearest coastlines by province for a given address.  Indicate if distance geojson lines are required as part of the response.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://distance-to-coast-by-address1.p.rapidapi.com/distance-to-coast-address"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "distance-to-coast-by-address1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://distance-to-coast-by-address1.p.rapidapi.com/distance-to-coast-address"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "distance-to-coast-by-address1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
